attributes.action: Revoke parliamentary decision powers on brexit and withdrawal agreements.
attributes.additional_details: The problem is the parliament and that they do not agree with the rest of the UK and are there for trying block this process to force another vote. What the Parliament is doing is a travesty and an insult to the democratic process please help to send the parliament a message to get in line with THE GOVERNMENT WE THE PEOPLE PICKED or get out of the way.
attributes.background: The UK people voted to leave the EU with a majority of 51.89% however according to the press associations poll taken before the EU Referendum MP’s only voted 24.5% to leave with 73.8% voting to remain in the EU.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. We aren't sure exactly what decisions you would like Parliament to change.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/246387
